newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks firm in early morning on Wall St.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks firm in early morning on Wall St.

text.p: Tokyo stocks traded firmer in early morning trade on Monday, after opening slightly lower.
The market was heartened by a surge in U.S. stocks on Friday, but caution over a sharp climb in the yen against the dollar limited buying, brokers said.
At 0008 GMT, the 225-share Nikkei average was up 29.80 points, or 0.15 percent, at 20,515.55. Its June futures rose 30 points to 20,520.
